name: The Fish House
description:
A cat is lured away from his home by the Fish House. Help him find his way back through Fishpond City!

  • Fight ghosts, mice and more to earn points!
  • Throw Mouse Traps and Bones!
  • Collect White Mice and Fish to become stronger for five seconds!
  • DON'T TOUCH THE TOOTHPASTE!

Navigate Fishpond City and destroy anything that stands in your way, just to return to your owner. Cut down ghosts and explode mice. Eat a White Mouse to run faster than everything. Seriously, though. Don't touch the toothpaste.
